thread.title: BRIEF-Singapore Exchange ‍Says SGX & Bursa Malaysia To Set Up Stock Market Trading Link​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Singapore Exchange ‍Says SGX & Bursa Malaysia To Set Up Stock Market Trading Link​
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Singapore Exchange Ltd:
* ‍SGX AND BURSA MALAYSIA TO SET UP STOCK MARKET TRADING LINK​
* ‍SGX AND BM WILL JOINTLY WORK OUT OPERATIONAL MODEL AND SAFEGUARDS FOR TRADING LINK​
* SUPPORTS MONETARY AUTHORITY OF SINGAPORE & SECURITIES COMMISSION MALAYSIA‘S ANNOUNCEMENT ON ESTABLISHING BM-SGX TRADING LINK
* ‍EACH MARKET WILL CONTINUE TO BE GOVERNED BY ITS OWN LISTING, TRADING AND CLEARING RULES AND REGULATIONS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
